name: 06 - Routine - Same Procedure...
description:
Game A Week - Theme 6: Routine
"Same Procedure" made by Hannah Pollow
Made in the week of 7th of May until 21th of May
---
James, the butler of Miss Sophie celebrates her Birthday. But Miss Sophie is already very old and outlived her invited guests. So James needs to play the guests and drink for them. 
Be James and prepare the Dinner for Miss Sophie and drink like the years before... and before... It`s always the same procedure... Imitate the Guests (not in this game actually....) and drink!  Keyfeatures:  - Experience the fantastic Film Noir Genre in one game! 
- Play as a Butler who gets drunk! ;)  --- GitRepo: 
https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/nr6.-routine-same-procedure..../src/master/ Who made this?  Hannah Pollow https://twitter.com/Hanndragggon
Jörg Sroka as great Programming Support <3  --- Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" Summer Semester 2019)
